name: B.Sc. in Information & Communication Engineering
description: Focuses on communication systems, wireless networks, and signal processing with industry-oriented projects.

name: B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering
description: Covers AI, machine learning, software development, and cybersecurity with advanced labs.

description: Advanced study in algorithms, machine learning, and software systems for research and industry.

name: B.Sc. in Electrical and Electronic Engineering
description: Emphasizes power systems, renewable energy, and electronics with practical training.

name: B.Sc. in Textile Engineering
description: Covers textile manufacturing, sustainable materials, and apparel production technologies.

name: Bachelor of Business Administration
description: Provides education in management, finance, marketing, and entrepreneurship.

accreditation: Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs (ACBSP)

name: Master of Business Administration
description: Advanced study in business strategy, leadership, and global markets.
